ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(ISCHANGED( Type ), $User.Id <> OwnerId, $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator", $Profile.Name <> "Super User", $Profile.Name <> "Partner Associate", $Profile.Name <> "Client Account Managers", $User.Alias <> "jbard" )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Only partner's team or account owner can change the field
